Abraham Coiman is an agronomist specialized in geomatics. His research interests include Geographical Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing and Geographical Data Science. With a bachelor’s degree in Agronomy and a postgraduate diploma in Geomatics, he has more than ten years of experience in using Geospatial Information Technology, GIS and Remote Sensing tools.
His professional and scientific experience includes spatial analysis using ArcGIS and QGIS, Remote Sensing image analysis using ENVI, eCognition and Google Earth Engine, creating highly accurate maps, building web mapping applications using ArcGIS online and open source software, and geospatial analysis using data science tools.

summary: Advances in information technology allow people to visualize and analyze geographical data shared from computer to computer via Internet. Modern applications to build interactive web maps are classify according to the way of data storage. In this respect, we have those that imply the acquisition of information storage services like ArcGIS Online, and those that involve the administration and managing of own servers. I3Geo is an application for the development of interactive web maps. It integrates several open source applications into a single development platform, mainly Mapserver and OpenLayers. Basically, i3Geo consist of two interfaces: user interface intended for visualizing and geoprocessing , and a management interface for interactive management of geospatial data. In Venezuela there are two cases of i3geo implementation: Geoportal INSAI and PDVSA Oriente.
title: Building Interactive Web Maps with i3geo

summary: Valencia lake basin is located in the central region of Venezuela between Aragua and Carabobo states. During the last four decades it has experienced a significant urban sprawl. This situation has created important land use and land cover (LULC) changes, especially in areas near the shore of Valencia lake. It is important to highlight the case of Zamora municipality where this phenomenon has affected lands with high potential for agricultural use. Considering these circumstances, this research has as main goal evaluating the costal dynamics of Valencia lake and LULC changes in Zamora municipality between 1980 and 2014. To characterize LULC changes, the object-oriented classification of multispectral medium-spatial resolution satellite images was employed. SISDELAV (Sistema de Información de Suelos de la Depresión del Lago de Valencia) data and image classification outputs were used to pinpoint coastal evolution of Valencia lake. A spatial analysis was carried out using SISDELAV data, classified images and GIS, in order to identify areas in conflict with potential for agricultural use, coastal evolution of the lake, and LULC changes. Finally, the resulting geospatial information was integrated into a WebGIS application.
title: PGDip. Thesis in Geomatics

summary: Se hizo un estudio de los aspectos sociales, técnicos y económicos de los pequeños productores pertenecientes al sector El Ramal del asentamiento campesino Los Cañizos, Estado Yaracuy. Para ello se aplicaron encuestas a una muestra de quince (15) productores, cuyo análisis permitió detectar una alta deserción escolar de niños y jóvenes, los cuales pasan principalmente a formar parte de la mano de obra agrícola familiar; Unos bajos niveles de ingresos agrícolas familiares, los cuales son a menudo compensados por otras actividades no agrícolas. En este mismo orden de ideas se pudo observar que la actividad agrícola vegetal prevalece por sobre la actividad agrícola animal, siendo los rubro más importantes del sector el Plátano hartón (Musa balbisiana), el Aguacate criollo (Persea americana) y el maíz (Zea mays). El estudio permitió detectar que desde el punto de vista técnico, los productores hacen un uso excesivo de insumos y servicios respectivos, principalmente en la fertilización del Aguacate y el Plátano y; en la fertilización, control de malezas y, control de plagas y enfermedades en el rubro Maíz, Económicamente observamos (No se pudo determinar la rentabilidad económica del Aguacate por no existir registros por parte de los agricultores), que el rubro Plátano es más rentable que el maíz, notamos cómo el Plátano ofrece un ingreso Agrícola Familiar de 1.161.528 Bs./año, mientras que el Maíz ofrece un Ingreso Agrícola Familiar de 980.776 Bs./año. Los resultados de esta investigación permitieron formular algunas recomendaciones, para la elaboración de un programa de desarrollo integral de la agricultura en el sector. Dichas recomendaciones están basadas principalmente en la combinación de dos áreas: 1) La corrección de las fallas tecnológicas de los cultivos con más salida de mercado y, 2) Una agricultura familiar tipo Granja Integral Sustentable.
title: BSc. Thesis in Agronomy

content:
The main goal of the Mining Geoportal (GeoMiNa) is to serve as a central repository for all data related to mining activities in Venezuela. GeoMiNa is a free and open data resource intended to support public and private management in the mining sector, as well as a means to exchange data between stakeholders. GeoMiNa’s users will be the staff of the Mining Ministry (MPPDME) and the Institute for Geology and Mining (INGEOMIN), who will use the data for mining research and planning in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela.
Link: http://sigminas.desarrollominero.gob.ve
summary: Central repository for all mining activities data in Venezuela
title: Mining Geoportal
